tool_description: Identifies and extracts all date-related information from invoices including invoice date, due date, service period, and delivery dates.

locale.description: Locale for date interpretation (en-US, en-GB, etc.)

error_messages: No text provided: Input OCR text content is required
No dates found: Text does not contain recognizable date patterns
Invalid date format specification: Use standard date format patterns
Ambiguous date interpretation: Multiple valid date interpretations found, specify locale or format
usage: Provide OCR text and optionally specify expected date formats and locale. Returns all identified dates with their types and confidence levels.

invoice_date.description: Main invoice date in ISO format

service_start_date.description: Service period start date if applicable

service_end_date.description: Service period end date if applicable

delivery_date.description: Delivery or shipped date if found

all_dates_found.description: All date strings identified in the document

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each extracted date
